caption: Relating to instruction in human trafficking awareness in public schools.
summary: This bill requires Texas public schools to include human trafficking awareness education. Students in grades 6-8 must complete a one-semester course, while high school students need a half-credit course. The curriculum covers trafficking causes, prevention, online safety, and policy responses. This bill does not specifically target Chinese immigrants but applies to all students in Texas public schools.
translation: 该法案要求德克萨斯州公立学校加入人口贩运意识教育。6-8年级学生必须完成一个学期的课程，高中生需要完成半学分课程。课程内容包括人口贩运的原因、预防、网络安全和政策应对。该法案并不特别针对中国移民，而是适用于德克萨斯州公立学校的所有学生。
committees:
